metadata.description: Includes appendices issued Mar. 1945, Sept. 1945 and Jan. 1946
"A. J. Hooke, Chairman, Post-War Reconstruction Committee and Sub-Committee on Finance."

1.Report of the Subcommittee on Agriculture -- 2. Report of the Subcommittee on Education -- 3. Report of the Subcommittee on Finance -- 4. Report of the Subcommittee on Industry -- 5. Report of the Subcommittee on Natural Resources -- 6. Report of the Subcommittee on Public Works -- 7. Report of the Subcommittee on Social Welfare -- appendix 1.
